mapper.select: /* 시설 내 회원 목록 조회 */ SELECT f.facility_cd as facilityCd ,f.user_id as userId ,u.user_nm as userName ,u.user_address as userAddr ,u.user_tell as userTell ,u.user_gender as userGender ,u.user_email as userEmail ,f.facility_user_level as facilityUserLevel ,f.facility_approve_state as facilityApproveState ,f.facility_approve_id as facilityApproveId ,f.facility_approve_date as facilityApproveDate ,f.facility_reg_date as facilityRegDate FROM facility_user as f INNER JOIN user AS u ON u.user_id = f.user_id AND facility_cd = #{facilityCd} LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};
/* 회원 아이디 중복 체크 */ SELECT IF(COUNT(1) = 1, 0, 1) FROM user AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

/* 회원 전체 목록 조회 */ SELECT user_id as userId ,user_level as userLevel ,user_password as userPw ,user_nm as userName ,user_address as userAddr ,user_birth as userBirth ,user_email as userEmail ,user_tell as userTell ,user_gender as userGender ,user_drop as userDrop ,reg_path as userRegPath ,user_terms as userTerms ,user_reg_date as userRegDate ,user_post_num as userPostNum ,user_detail_addr as userDetailAddr FROM user LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

/* 아이디로 회원 정보 조회 */ SELECT u.user_id ,u.user_level ,u.user_password ,u.user_nm ,u.user_address ,u.user_birth ,u.user_email ,u.user_tell ,u.user_gender ,u.user_drop ,u.reg_path ,u.user_terms ,u.user_reg_date ,u.user_post_num ,u.user_detail_addr FROM user as u WHERE user_id = #{userId};
SELECT login_number ,user_id ,login_date ,logout_date FROM user_login ORDER BY CAST(login_number AS SIGNED) LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};
